EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_JK/Molina Hadoop Native SQL_Q416.Cancel/Invite 12-19-16
EmailTemplate.subject: January 10, 2017 Webinar Cancelled - Molina Healthcare Drives Operational Efficiency with Hadoop & Analytics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]> The webinar titled, Molina Healthcare Drives Operational Efficiency with Hadoop & Analytics, on January 10, 2017 is cancelled due to speaker conflict. Our apologies for any inconvenience this has caused.
Please join us <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]> on January 17, for our next data topic, Using Data Science for Cybersecurity <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>, with Pivotal’s Anirudh Kondaveeti and Jeff Kelly. More details below:
Date: Tuesday, January 17, 2017 Time: 11:00am PST / 2:00pm EST
Save My Seat <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>
We also invite you to take advantage of Pivotal’s joint technical webinar series with Hortonworks on HDB, the Hadoop native SQL database powering advanced analytics, including these titles:
- How to Install Hortonworks HDB on Hortonworks HDP <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/9573/222075]]> - How to use PXF with Hortonworks HDB <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/9573/222065]]> - How to get Started with Apache MADlib on Hortonworks HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/apache-madlib-hortonworks-hdb/]]> - How to use Apache Zeppelin with Hortonworks HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/use-apache-zeppelin-hortonworks-hdb/]]>
We hope you join us for Using Data Science for Cybersecurity <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>.
Kind regards, The Pivotal Team
